MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH4 area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:53pm. Our engineers have arrived onsite at the Comely Bank substation to investigate the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:37pm on Monday, 23 November 2020
